issues.description: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm the function symbol fix_vec_sub_asm is declared as extern instead of global, whereas in the template it is declared global. This mismatch in symbol visibility will prevent the fix_vec_sub_asm definition from being exported for linking and break the intended build.
issues.suggested_fix: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm replace the ‘extern fix_vec_sub_asm’ directive with ‘global fix_vec_sub_asm’ so that the symbol is correctly exported for linking.
